text:
Trying to generate video with Seedance 2.0 right now is such a mess. 

Everything I try to prompt from an image is blocked, and even videos without a start image are being blocked. 

After an hour of rendering I was able to get a 15 second clip of "Dog chases cat." 

Hbu? https://t.co/vgDugMqiJ0

no, this isn't Seedance 2.0.

but can you believe this multi-shot sequence is made with one prompt?

just using AVA. want to try it?

reply with "aivideo" and we will DM you a link. https://t.co/i3Dmb1iuc9

Seedance 2.0

Prompt: Timothee Chalamet at the Apple keynote.  Don't make it gay. https://t.co/cZV70cl3Mb

Prompt: "My cat is a secret agent." 

Tool: Seedance 2.0

The moment the mustache and top hat went on... perfect vibe. AI video comprehension is getting absolutely insane right now. ğŸ•µï¸â€â™‚ï¸ğŸ¤¯ https://t.co/4dCw49mxyW

One word Prompt in Seedance 2.0 ï¼š

"Paradox"

Seedance 2.0 has a good understanding of individual words, and the generated videos are error-free and successful. The simple prompts also improve the success rate of prompt review. https://t.co/IzZEGdamxk

Powered by Seedance 2.0: it studies winning clips, learns the pattern, and recreates view-getting content.

No timeline. No stress. Prompt and post...

Example https://t.co/r3oDK3Z7QR

Seedance 2 in @pixio_ai is absolutely insane.

Blockbuster level video with just a simple one line prompt. There is a lot you can do with 12 seconds, and it only takes 5 generations to have a minute of video.

The hype is real.

@kukaj94 cooked with this update. https://t.co/N8rtbpMvBZ

DTC brands, listen up.

This is 100% AI.

Seedance 2 just changed the entire game for you.
Here's what just happened:

I gave it two images. That's it.

It handled everything lip sync, movement, sound effects, timing. Every tiny detail locked in.
No more:

Testing 50 prompt and https://t.co/9NgOkFoMWX

Seedance 2 is very good at following a detailed list of scenes in a single prompt:

1. open with an establishing fly over shot of a misty jungle in the early morning, a soldier (the woman in the image) is in a chopper in army uniform, she says "We're entering foh-fur country now. https://t.co/E32mPvb9lt

In this test Seedance 2 seamlessly handles switching away from a scene, to something completely different, and then back again.

Prompt:
1. two people in a cafe, one says, "did you ever see that foh-fur movie?", the other: "Yeah, I remember it well.."
2. cuts to a dark sci-fi https://t.co/gzTizrpJTZ
